title: [GAMEPLAY] Teemo's normal auto attack sound effect stays in the Astro and Omega Squad skins
body:
I play Teemo alot and one thing that has been bugging me for a while is when you auto with the Astro Or Omega Squad skin, the sound effect from both the skin your using and the normal teemo auto attack sound plays at the same time and it's not as clear on Omega Squad, but I cannot even play Astro because it just bugs me that much, Basically what I'm saying is say you use Astro Teemo, the *PEW* sound effect will play with the normal sounding Teemo auto attack noise (Classic, Happy Elf, Recon, Badger, Cottontail, Panda, Super) at the same time combining the two auto attack noises together throwing me off a little. I have noticed this for about a month and a half now, but it's started to bug me sooo much that I don't even want to use Astro or Omega skins that much anymore. Maybe I'm wrong though and it's supposed to be like this, but I'm pretty sure its not.

If it is a bug, Please try and fix this in the next little while, I don't care if it takes a week or a month, I just want it done eventually.

Sorry if you don't appreciate the layout of this post, this is my first time reporting a bug on the boards.

replies.body:
Hey SlimeyBoyRioy,

I'm a skins audio dude. Just looked into this for ya, everything seemed to be working as intended. Some skins use pieces of the base sounds to create the sound of an ability. In this case, Astronaut Teemo has the same cast sound as base Teemo, but a new laser sound, and laser hit sound. Omega squad has totally new auto attack sounds and was working just fine, playing all of his original audio.

Actually, update: I checked out an early skins spotlight of the video, and it seemed like the Cast for Basic Attacks on Astronaut Teemo wasn't working at all. I went ahead and lower the volume by 8dB (about 1.5x quieter). It'll still be there for gameplay feedback, but should be less obtrusive now. You'll see this out in 6.11 or 6.10!

Cheers,

Vonderhamz

> [{quoted}](name=Vonderhamz,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=0HT6is8z,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-05-17T01:27:22.647+0000)
>
> Actually, update: I checked out an early skins spotlight of the video, and it seemed like the Cast for Basic Attacks on Astronaut Teemo wasn't working at all. I went ahead and lower the volume by 8dB (about 1.5x quieter). It'll still be there for gameplay feedback, but should be less obtrusive now. You'll see this out in 6.11 or 6.10!
> 
> Cheers,
> 
> Vonderhamz

Thank you for taking your time to look into this ^_^

Hiya! ^-^ 

Thanks for the report! We can certainly take a look and see what's going on here. :)

Thanks for the reply, this is something that has been bugging me as well with the Omega Squad skin. I love the skin to bits, but the auto attack noises just feel so inconsistent with Teemo's autos. It would be great if it's fixed in the near future! :D
